txt.en: 'The beasts of Ered Luin are more easily frightened of late, which makes hunting them much more difficult.'
'When I was young, I seasoned my first axe on a ferocious lynx that terrorized my family's home.'
'The wind blows coldly in Ered Luin, but it is a reminder that we still live.'
'I used to carve a notch in my axe for every kill, but then I ran out of space to notch!'
